targets.query: SELECT mean("n_cpus") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("n_users") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load15") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "swap" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "processes" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("total_threads") FROM "processes" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(load1) as load1,mean(load5) as load5,mean(load15) as load15 FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean(usage_idle) as "idle", mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ and  cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d[a-z]$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(writes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d[a-z]$/AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d[a-z]$/AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_bytes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d[a-z]$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d[a-z]$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_time),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d[a-z]$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond|em).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond|em).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond|vmbr|ens|em).*/ AND interface !~ /veth/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond|vmbr|ens|em).*/ AND interface !~ /veth/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)

SELECT mean(tcp_close) as CLOSED, mean(tcp_close_wait) as CLOSE_WAIT, mean(tcp_closing) as CLOSING, mean(tcp_established) as ESTABLISHED, mean(tcp_fin_wait1) as FIN_WAIT1, mean(tcp_fin_wait2) as FIN_WAIT2, mean(tcp_last_ack) as LAST_ACK, mean(tcp_syn_recv) as SYN_RECV, mean(tcp_syn_sent) as SYN_SENT, mean(tcp_time_wait) as TIME_WAIT FROM "netstat" WHERE host =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean("usage_percent") FROM "docker_container_cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "container_name" fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage") FROM "docker_container_mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "container_name" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("tx_bytes"), 10s) FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "container_name" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("rx_bytes"), 10s) FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "container_name" fill(null)

list.label: host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "host"
